path.style: alignment-baseline: initial; stroke-miterlimit: 5; stroke-width: 5px; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round; fill: none; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255);

rect.style: fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 5px; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255);
fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 5px; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255);

path.style: fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 5px; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255);
fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 5px; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255);
fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 5px; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255);
fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 5px; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255);
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 6px; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255);
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 6px; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255);
